name: Target: Inaccurate Jane
description:
Calamity Jane has become inaccurate and is now wreaking havoc in town ! You must get to her and stop her while avoiding her deadly bullets !

Controls:

- Arrow keys for movement

Calamity Jane has a cyclical shooting pattern which will increase in difficulty each time you get to her. Try to get the highest score !

This is my first game and my first game jam, it is nothing great but it is playable. I had a lot of ideas or have found a lot of bugs/janky movement mechanics but I didn't have time to implement them/fix them because I started the project very late (eg: sound effects). Still very fun to do and made me learn a lot about game dev, which was the reason I registered for the Jam in the first place.

Credits for assets/software used:

- Player sprites: Pixeldudesmaker by 0x72 (https://0x72.itch.io/pixeldudesmaker)

- Menu background: Pixelator by ronenness (https://ronenness.itch.io/pixelator)

- Tiles and Jane sprite : Generic OLDWEST Pack by Vaca Roxa (https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-oldwest-pack)

- Font: Humble fonts by somepx (https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-free)

- Music: Fastest Gun in the 8-Bit West by OkamiDeluxe
